name: Boobytales
storyline:
There are things called legends in every world.

However, most of them are far from the truth and are nothing more than lies amplified by the latter. The legends of this world are the same; no one knows the truth, only rumors spread.

Still, people are drawn to the story. For their own desires and to find a helping hand, each of them hides their thoughts and searches for them...

This is a goofy story. Those who pursue the legend, those who get caught up in it. This is a goofy story of people who gather under the legendary name "Egg", guided by fate.
summary: A doujin 1v1 fighting game featuring several animal characters, created with 2D Fighter Maker '95. The version available online is labelled "Test Version +", but is unfinished. Most of the fighters are playable, but some (Byufero, Tarshow & Need) are unfinished.
